00006 BBImpedance::BBImpedance(int NZ)
00007 {
00008         Z=vector<komplex>(NZ/2);
00009         for(int j=0; j<NZ/2; j++) Z[j]=0.0;
00010 }

00013 NBImpedance::NBImpedance(int h, int N_t)
00014 : time_window(2*N_t)
00015 {
00016         harmonic=h;
00017         Z=vector<komplex>(N_t);
00018         for(int j=0; j<N_t; j++) Z[j]=0.0;
00019 }

00021 
00022 void BBImpedance::cavity(double Rs, double Q, double harmonic, double omega0, double off_res)
00023 {
00024         int j;
00025         komplex i(0.0,1.0);
00026         double omega_h=harmonic*omega0+off_res;
00027         for(j=1; j<Z.size(); j++)  
00028                 Z[j]+=Rs/(1.0+i*Q*((omega0*j)/omega_h-omega_h/(omega0*j)));
00029 }
00030 
00031 
00032 void BBImpedance::MA_cavity(double Zabs,double phase0, double phase1, double fmax, double f0)
00033 {
00034  double fj;             
00035  for(int j=1; j<Z.size(); j++)  
00036    { 
00037     fj=j*f0;     
00038     Z[j]+=std::polar(Zabs,PI*(phase0+(phase1-phase0)*fj/fmax)/180.0);   
00039    }
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 void NBImpedance::cavity(double Rs, double Q, double omega0, double off_res, double dt)
00044 {
00045         int N_t=time_window.size()/2;
00046         if( N_t==0 ) return;
00047         int j;
00048         komplex i(0.0,1.0);
00049         double omega_res=harmonic*omega0+off_res;
00050         for(j=0; j<Z.size(); j++)
00051         {
00052                 double N_t=time_window.size()/2.0;
00053                 double omega=omega0*harmonic+j*2.0*PI/(N_t*dt)-PI/dt;
00054                 if( omega != 0.0 )
00055                         Z[j]=Rs/(1.0+i*Q*(omega/omega_res-omega_res/omega));
00056         }
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 void BBImpedance::spacecharge(double Z0, double h_c)
00061 {
00062         int j;
00063         komplex i(0,1.0);
00064         for(j=1; j<Z.size(); j++)  
00065                 Z[j]+=-i*Z0*(double)(j)/(1.0+pow((double)j/h_c,2));
00066 }

00069 // `beam loading' field ( returns amplitude, efield, potential)
00070 //  input current, dt, dz, circum, e_kin:
00071 
00072 
00073 void BBImpedance::InducedField(Grid1D& efield, Grid1D& line_current_density)
00074 {
00075         double bl_real, bl_imag; 
00076         double dz=efield.get_dz();
00077         int n=efield.get_size();
00078         double circum=dz*n;
00079         vektor current(n);
00080         for(int j=0; j<n; j++) current[j]=line_current_density[j]; 
00081 
00082         realft(current,1);
00083 
00084         for(int h=0; h < n/2-1; h++)
00085         {
00086 
00087                 komplex temc(current[2*h],current[2*h+1]);
00088                 komplex temc2=-temc*Z[h];
00089 
00090                 bl_real = temc2.real()/circum; 
00091                 bl_imag = temc2.imag()/circum;         
00092 
00093                 current[2*h]=bl_real;
00094                 current[2*h+1]=bl_imag;
00095         }
00096 
00097         realft(current,-1);
00098 
00099         for(int j=0; j<n; j++)
00100                 efield[j]=current[j];    
00101 
00102         return;
00103 }

00105 
00106 void BBImpedance::InducedPotential(Grid1D& potential, Grid1D& line_current_density)
00107 {
00108         komplex i(0.0,1.0);
00109         double bl_real=0.0, bl_imag=0.0; 
00110         double dz=potential.get_dz();
00111         int n=potential.get_size();
00112         double circum=dz*n;
00113         double R=circum/(2.0*PI);
00114         vektor current(n);
00115         for(int j=0; j<n; j++) current[j]=line_current_density[j]; 
00116 
00117         realft(current,1);
00118 
00119         for(int h=1; h < n/2-1; h++)
00120         {
00121 
00122                 komplex temc(current[2*h],current[2*h+1]);
00123                 komplex temc2=-i*temc*Z[h]*R/((double)h);
00124 
00125                 bl_real = temc2.real(); 
00126                 bl_imag = temc2.imag();         
00127 
00128                 current[2*h]=bl_real;
00129                 current[2*h+1]=bl_imag;
00130         }
00131 
00132         realft(current,-1);
00133 
00134         for(int j=0; j<n; j++)
00135                 potential[j]=current[j];    
00136 
00137         return;
00138 }

00141 void NBImpedance::InducedField(Grid1D& efield, Grid1D& line_current_density)
00142 {
00143         int n=efield.get_size();
00144         int N_t=time_window.size()/2;
00145         
00146         if ( N_t == 0) {
00147                 for(int j=0;j<n;j++) efield[j]=0.0;
00148                 return;
00149         }
00150         
00151         static int t=0;
00152         double bl_amp, bl_real, bl_imag, bl_phase; 
00153         double dz=efield.get_dz();
00154         
00155         double circum=dz*n;
00156         double bucket_h = circum/(double)harmonic;
00157         vektor current(n);
00158         for(int j=0; j<n; j++) current[j]=line_current_density[j]; 
00159 
00160         realft(current,1);
00161 
00162         if(t==0)
00163         {
00164                 for(int j=0;j<2*N_t;j+=2)
00165                 {
00166                         time_window[j]=current[2*(int)harmonic];
00167                         time_window[j+1]=current[2*(int)harmonic+1];
00168                 }
00169                 t=1;
00170         }
00171 
00172         time_window.pop_front();
00173         time_window.pop_front();
00174         time_window.push_back(current[2*(int)harmonic]);
00175         time_window.push_back(current[2*(int)harmonic+1]);
00176 
00177         vektor tem(2*N_t);
00178         for(int j=0;j<2*N_t;j++)
00179                 tem[j]=time_window[j]; 
00180         four1(tem,1);
00181 
00182         for(int j=0;j<=N_t/2;j++)
00183         { 
00184                 komplex temc(tem[2*j],tem[2*j+1]);
00185                 komplex temc2(0.0,0.0);
00186                 temc2=-temc*Z[N_t/2-j];
00187                 tem[2*j]=temc2.real(); 
00188                 tem[2*j+1]=temc2.imag(); 
00189         }
00190 
00191         for(int j=1;j<N_t/2;j++)
00192         { 
00193                 komplex temc(tem[2*N_t-2*j-3],tem[2*N_t-2*j-2]);
00194                 komplex temc2(0.0,0.0);
00195                 temc2=-temc*Z[j+N_t/2];
00196                 tem[2*N_t-2*j-3]=temc2.real(); 
00197                 tem[2*N_t-2*j-2]=temc2.imag(); 
00198         }
00199 
00200         four1(tem,-1);
00201 
00202         bl_real=tem[2*N_t-2]/circum;
00203         bl_imag=tem[2*N_t-1]/circum;
00204         bl_amp   = sqrt(bl_real*bl_real+bl_imag*bl_imag) ;
00205         bl_phase = atan2(bl_imag,bl_real) ;
00206 
00207         for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
00208                 efield[j]=bl_amp*cos(2.0*PI/bucket_h*(j+0.5)*dz-bl_phase);
00209 
00210         return;
00211 
00212 }
